message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a bit more to make this worthwhile for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I believe you'll find the product to be a great value. What do you say?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
